Absolutely Zero Cost to Join & Earn

  • • No joining fee, no investment, no extra payment—ever.
  • • You only pay for what you actually use: recharge, bills, shopping, food, etc.
  • • Your income comes from your own and your team's real service usage.
  • • No hidden charges, no packages, no upgrades, no pressure.
Example: If you recharge your mobile for ₹399, you pay only ₹399—no extra. If your team orders food, pays bills, or shops online, you earn a share from their real spending. That's it!

Strict Rules – Please Read!

Important Information

Income is ONLY for real service usage. No income for just referring or adding people.
Strict KYC, one account per person, and all government rules must be followed.
No group income from inactive or dummy accounts. Only real, active users generate income.
No multiple accounts for yourself or your family. One account per person only.
No fake activity. Any attempt to manipulate the system = permanent ban.
You must complete the NioPay knowledge test before you can withdraw any earnings.
No cash circulation. This is not an investment or money-rotation scheme. Only real service payments are allowed.
No false promises or misleading income claims. If found, your account will be suspended.
Support and benefits are only for genuine users who follow all rules and use real services.
Any fraud or violation may result in legal action as per Indian law.
No team pressure. Team growth is optional and only for those interested.
Transparency: All commissions, rules, and processes are 100% visible in your NioPay dashboard.
Note: Only real, active service usage brings income. Adding people alone will never generate earnings. Follow all rules strictly to keep your account and earnings safe.

Frequently Asked Questions

Got questions? We've got honest answers!
Is NioPay really 100% free? Will I ever be asked to pay anything?
Yes, NioPay is 100% free. You will never be asked to pay any joining fee, package, or investment. You only pay for the real services you use (like recharge, shopping, food, etc.).
Can I earn money just by referring people, without using any services?
No. Income is only for real service usage. You do not earn anything for just referring or adding people. Only when you and your team use real services do you earn.
What happens if I don't use any service for a few months?
If you don't use any service for 60 days, your account becomes inactive and you will not earn until you use a service again.
Is this legal? How is NioPay different from MLM or Ponzi schemes?
NioPay is 100% legal, government-compliant, and service-based. There is no investment, no product purchase, and no money rotation. You earn only from real service usage, not from joining or referring.
How do I withdraw my earnings? Is there a minimum payout?
Your earnings are credited to your NioPay wallet. You can withdraw to your bank account daily. Minimum payout is ₹100.
Can I have more than one account (for family, etc.)?
No. Only one account per person (Aadhaar/phone) is allowed. Multiple accounts are strictly prohibited.
What services can I use to earn income?
You can use mobile recharge, DTH, electricity, shopping, food delivery, travel, OTT, and more. The more you use, the more you can earn.
Do I have to build a team to earn, or can I earn alone?
You can earn cashback on your own usage. Team income is optional and only for those who want to grow further. No pressure.
How is my income calculated? Is it fixed or does it depend on usage?
Your income depends on the real service usage by you and your team. The more you and your team use, the more you earn. There are no fixed or guaranteed amounts.
What if someone tries to cheat the system?
Any fake activity, multiple accounts, or system manipulation will result in permanent ban and possible legal action.
What is the NioPay knowledge test and why is it required?
The knowledge test ensures you understand the rules, compliance, and how to earn legally. You must pass it before withdrawing earnings.
How do I get support if I have a problem?
You can contact NioPay support through the app or website. Only genuine, rule-following users will get support.
Will my rank ever go down if I become inactive?
No, your rank never goes down once achieved. But you must follow all rules to keep your account active.
Is my data and money safe with NioPay?
Yes, NioPay uses strict KYC, security, and legal compliance to keep your data and money safe.
How do I know if I'm following all the rules?
All rules, commissions, and processes are clearly shown in your NioPay dashboard. Read the Important Information section and pass the knowledge test.
